content.content: Landed in NYC, feeling a mix of excitement and being out of my depth. Got an internship at a quant firm; diving into AI for trading. Also, sketching again, inspired by Tokyo's art. Balancing passion and stability is tough but I'm here for the ride.
content.raw_content: "Just landed in NYC! Excited but a bit overwhelmed. Got an internship at a quant firm, diving into AI for trading. Also, started sketching again, inspired by Tokyo's art scene. Balancing passion and stability, one step at a time."

content.content: Turned 22 in NYC, diving into AI trading at my internship. Also, sketching and blockchain identity are keeping me busy. It's a whirlwind of code, art, and new faces. Here's to the chaos!
content.raw_content: "Just turned 22 in NYC, and things are picking up. I've started an internship at a quant firm, focusing on AI for trading. Also, exploring digital identity in blockchain. Sketching again too. Life's a mix of code, art, and new connections. #YoungTechFounder"
